preparation.raw_text:
1. In a fume hood or well-ventilated area, wear appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, lab coat). 
 2. Weigh 30.0 g of arsenic using a precision balance. 
 3. Weigh 10.0 g of phosphorus. 
 4. Weigh 10.0 g of platinum. 
 5. Weigh 60.0 g of sulfur. 
 6. In a clean, dry container, combine all weighed ingredients thoroughly using a spatula, ensuring an even mixture.
